channel.title: Linux Reader
channel.description: Welcome! Check out super awesome Linux stuff: Ansible Bash Boot Containers Cyber Security Desktop Keyboard Files Networking Packages Storage System Tools Users and Groups Virtualization Also check out what I am doing now, read my book notes, contact me, or see what this site is all about
